id.description: The unique identifier for the segmentation.

name.description: The name given to the segmentation.

standard.description: The standard used for the segmentation.

created_at.description: The timestamp indicating when the segmentation was created.

updated_at.description: The timestamp indicating when the segmentation was last updated.

process_status.description: The status of the segmentation process.

rel.description: The relationship type of the link.

href.description: The URL link associated with the segmentation.

media.description: The media type of the link.
